application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Lawson Cypress - Reduce to height of roof. Trim all sides back as far as possible to shape the tree.T.2 Horse Chestnut - 3-4m Reduction in height reshaping sympathetically into lower suitable growth points, remove lower limb growing over neighbouring property & deadwood.T.3 Acacia - 3-4m Reduction in height reshaping sympathetically into lower suitable growth points & deadwood.
